snippet: Although a higher income tax rate will apply only to the wealthy, the elimination of a payroll tax break will take more money out of most paychecks.
abstract: Only the most affluent American households will pay higher income taxes under terms of fiscal deal that passed Congress, but most Americans will see more money taken out of their paychecks because deal does not extend two-year-old payroll tax break.

byline.original: By BINYAMIN APPELBAUM and CATHERINE RAMPELL

lead_paragraph: Although a higher income tax rate will apply only to the wealthy, the elimination of a payroll tax break will take more money out of most paychecks.

headline.seo: Bigger Tax Bite for Most Households Under Senate Plan
headline.main: Bigger Tax Bite for Most Under Fiscal Pact
headline.print_headline: Bigger Tax Bite for Most Under Fiscal Pact
